item.title: DBC Backup 2 new version is ready for you
item.description: DBC Backup 2 is a WordPress plugin that creates backups of your database. DBC Backup 2 has just been update to v2.3.24. DBC Backup 2 has been completely redesigned and looks great as part of WordPress 3.8. What’s new in DBC Backup 2 The latest version of DBC Backup 2 includes a number of significant changes Support for PHP 5.x - resolves issue which required a manual work around / blocked importing backup files Support for MySQL 5.

item.title: Visual Layouts Filtrify & Isotope Visual Layouts – will they work with your WordPress Theme?
item.description: I recently received this email and thought I’d write up a few notes on my plugins. Right or Wrong … If you like the style of your theme, WordPress plugins are there to extend the function of your site. This means you don’t have to replace your existing theme just to get a new feature. Want to get a cool theme instead? If you do like the style / grid layout that I’m showing and want to replace your theme … then checkout the WooThemes range of themes.
